column4: hm i was getting "cannot remaining packages to disk" and now i'm rewriting the cd at 16x, is that ok?
is your iso image correct? https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Verify
are you running linux or windows?
what do you mean if it is correct... i downloaded i today ;]
visit the URL i sent you please
i did and it says This page does not exist yet.
um.. i can't manage ;]  would you explain me how to verify the iso
get this console app from here and follow the steps on the wiki http://www.pc-tools.net/win32/md5sums/
right, thanks i'll try that now

i still didn't manage to follow those steps, but i downloaded the files and this is what i get when i drag n drop the iso over the md5: ubuntu-5.10-install-i386.iso              100% 126751a2dc5528c2f9044d9e4ee36d61
so visit the download page where you got the iso, click on "mdgsums" and compare
my download manager downloaded the file from manny mirrors at once, so what i do
:) i finally did it. it is correct
now burn it as slowly as you can, not using Disk Utility
i already burned another cd at 16x (.. i could 8 but didn't want to wait) with nero6 (=disk utility?)
then go for it, but we've seen a lot of problems with higher-speed iso burning
k:) i'l try to install it again.. thanks for the help ;]
